data.text:
Well then everyone, as we once again pray for 
the continued success of the Mejiro family, 
please enjoy today's New Year's party.
data.name: Party MC

data.text:
Alright! Let's enjoy this party to the fullest, McQueen! 
Should I start with sushi?! Or maybe crab?! I can't decide!
data.name: Gold Ship

data.text:
Right now, I'm wondering why you're even here in the first place. 
This is the Mejiro Family's New Year's party, you know.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
Aw, don't be such a stiff! We're teammates that have exchanged 
sports drinks― which basically makes us like family!
data.name: Gold Ship

data.text:
C'mon, before all that fresh seafood escapes back to the deep, 
let's go capture them with these nets we call stomachs!
data.name: Gold Ship

data.text: I have no idea what you even mean…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text: Happy New Year, McQueen.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan

data.text:
Ryan and Dober, Happy New Year. 
I look forward to working with you this year, too.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
Yeah, likewise. 
Let's all do our best this year too.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text:
Last year, Dober finished with a G1 victory, so she'll have 
momentum going in to this one. I've been hearing rumors too so, 
I have high expectations.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
Ehehe, you're really popular aren't you? As another member 
of the Mejiro family, it makes me happy too.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan

data.text:
I-it's not like I wanted to be popular or anything…! 
I just entered races that I wanted to win.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text:
Besides, if we're talking about high expectations, 
isn't there someone else we should be talking about?
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text: Ah, I saw her a little earlier but…
data.name: Mejiro Ryan

data.text:
Bright-ojousama, it's almost time for your speech, 
so please make your way to the stage.
data.name: Party MC

data.text: …Speech?
data.name: Mejiro Bright

data.text:
About your achievements from last year! 
I spoke with you about this just a short while ago!
data.name: Party MC

data.text: Hmmmmm～…
data.name: Mejiro Bright

data.text:
…Ah, by speech you meant giving a speech. 
Yes, I understand～
data.name: Mejiro Bright

data.text: I'm begging you～, please～…
data.name: Party MC

data.text:
Oh my, Ryan-oneesama. 
And McQueen-sama and Dober too, how do you do～?
data.name: Mejiro Bright

data.text: As usual, Ryan gets the oneesama treatment I see.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text: Ahaha… well, I did look after her a lot when we were younger.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan

data.text:
Bright, your [Spring Tenno Sho] victory was truly magnificent. 
And it seems you've won the URA award as well.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
The Tenno Sho is a race inexorably linked to the Mejiro family. 
I feel a deep connection to it as well.
data.name: Mejiro Bright

data.text:
All of this, is due to Ryan-oneesama encouraging me on 
as a fellow team member. And so I offer my deepest gratitude.
data.name: Mejiro Bright

data.text:
In Classic grade you had a string of unfortunate 
races, too. When you started getting results in 
Senior grade, it really made me happy.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan

data.text:
But just like this, this year let's keep 
aiming together for even bigger titles!
data.name: Mejiro Ryan

data.text:
…But this year, it'll probably be somewhat 
difficult to get good results, I think.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text: The "Golden Generation"… is it?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
Yeah, this year they're moving up to Senior grade so there will 
definitely be plenty of chances to compete against them, right?
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text: Hmmmmm～…
data.name: Mejiro Bright

data.text:
No matter who my opponent is, 
I will just do what it is that I must.
data.name: Mejiro Bright

data.text:
Even with the feelings from all these regrettable 
defeats, I've finally reached the pinnacle. 
I will not easily hand over my spot.
data.name: Mejiro Bright

data.text:
…That's why, I will, without a doubt, meet those expectations. 
With consecutive victories at the [Spring Tenno Sho].
data.name: Mejiro Bright

data.text:
To the Mejiro family, the Tenno Sho are special 
races. To win them consecutively would be an 
achievement as remarkable as McQueen's.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text:
Ehehe, Bright may look like this, but she's actually 
quite a stubborn one, you know. After she's decided 
to win, she'll definitely win.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan

data.text:
Aaah, Bright-ojousama! You're still here?! 
It's almost time for your speech!
data.name: Party MC

data.text: …Speech?
data.name: Mejiro Bright

data.text: Not again～!!
data.name: Party MC

data.text: Bright's Spring goal is the [Spring Tenno Sho] is it…?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text: Is something wrong, McQueen?
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text: No… I suppose, that was to be expected.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
God, Buddha, and Shiraoki-sama! I pray that this 
year will be a year filled with great accomplishments!
data.name: Special Week

data.text:
…and, that the sweets I eat after meals 
won't make me gain weight…!
data.name: Special Week

data.text:
As the year begins, Special Week now 
becomes a part of the Senior class.

To celebrate the beginning of a new chapter, 
together with the members of , we're here for 
our first shrine visit of the New Year.

Everyone, sorry for making you wait! I've 
thoroughly had my prayers heard!
data.name: Special Week

data.text:
It seemed like you were praying pretty hard there. 
…By the way, who's Shiraoki-sama?
data.name: Winning Ticket

data.text: Seems like Fukukitaru's been influencing you…
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text:
You shouldn't rely only on prayers though. 
You, yourself, need to properly put in the effort too.
data.name: <username>

data.text:
You shouldn't rely only on prayers though. 
You, yourself, need to properly put in the effort too.
data.name: <username>

data.text:
Of course, even in training I'll be putting 
in a lot more effort than before!
data.name: Special Week

data.text:
After all, taking first place in a race is not something that's 
easy, I've been made to reeeeeally understand that…!
data.name: Special Week

data.text: …You've had a bunch of really close races lately, too.
data.name: Rice Shower

data.text:
After winning the [Derby], Special Week had continued in to the 
fall races with momentum, however―

She's pulling away, she's pulling away! Seiun 
Sky is escaping! Finally Special Week is coming 
from the outside! But, it's Seiun Sky!
data.name: Commentator

data.text:
Seiun Sky, in the [Kikka Sho] now crosses the goal 
in first place!! Her time is― an astonishing 
3:03.2! Amazing, it's a world record!
data.name: Commentator

data.text:
The "Derby Uma Musume" Special Week finishes 
3 lengths behind in 2nd place!
data.name: Commentator

data.text:
El Condor, it's El Condor! Air Groove and 
Special Week are catching up but, it's El Condor Pasa!
data.name: Commentator

data.text:
Classic grade Uma Musume El Condor Pasa, among this group 
of champions in the [Japan Cup], scores a dazzling victory!
data.name: Commentator

data.text:
Her contemporary, Special Week, was unable to 
catch her on the straight and finished 3rd!
data.name: Commentator

data.text: Sei-chan and El-chan were both really amazing…
data.name: Special Week

data.text:
For Spe-san who won the [Derby] to not be able 
to easily win, everyone in the "Golden Generation" 
is really strong, aren't they…?
data.name: Rice Shower

data.text: On top of that, this year she'll be entering the Senior grade.
data.name: <username>

data.text:
It won't be just her usual rivals, so that you aren't left behind 
by the older and younger generations, let's put in the effort!
data.name: <username>

data.text: Yeah!
data.name: Special Week

data.text:
Even if her defeats continue, Special Week will stay positive and 
continue to work hard. The passion for her dream, even in the New 
Year, remains unchanged.
…is something wrong, Suzuka?
data.name: <username>

data.text: …is something wrong, Suzuka?
data.name: <username>

data.text: Ah… No, not really…
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text:
It's all well and good that she's Senior class now, 
but have you decided on what Spe's Spring goal might be?
data.name: Narita Brian

data.text:
Ah, I've also been wondering about that! 
Trainer-san, what do you think?
data.name: Special Week

data.text:
Truthfully, I think Spe's abilities are really high. 
Specifically, I want to take full advantage of her stamina that 
allows for long spurts.
data.name: <username>

data.text:
That's why I was thinking of making Spe's 
Spring goal the [Spring Tenno Sho].
data.name: <username>

data.text:
That's why I was thinking of making Spe's 
Spring goal the [Spring Tenno Sho].
data.name: <username>

data.text: [Spring Tenno Sho]…!
data.name: Special Week

data.text:
Oh, that sounds good! 
I want to see Spe-chan running in the [Spring Tenno Sho] too!
data.name: Winning Ticket

data.text:
Since our team has a bunch of experienced champions, 
they can teach you some tips for the race!
data.name: Winning Ticket

data.text:
McQueen-chan and Rice-san, 
both of them were really cool when they won～…
data.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut

data.text:
Yeah, yeah! 
I've looked up to them ever since!
data.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs

data.text: E-ehehe…
data.name: Rice Shower

data.text:
If there's anything Rice can do, she'll help out. 
Spe-san, let's do our best together.
data.name: Rice Shower

data.text: Thank you very much～! Of course, I look forward to it!
data.name: Special Week

data.text:
Well then, let's go check out the food stalls. 
Today it'll be my treat.
data.name: <username>

data.text:
Enjoy it to your heart's content, 
and let's work hard this year too!
data.name: <username>

data.text:
Yeah! Aim for "Victory at the Tenno Sho"! 
Aim for "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"～!
data.name: Special Week

data.text: Saying that, Special Week raised her hand in the air.

Her dream still hadn't taken shape yet, 
but still I felt that I could see her taking hold of that dream.
